title: Kanye West Sketchers, Will Smith, The Lakers, Dirtiest Death and more.
itunes:title: Kanye West Sketchers, Will Smith, The Lakers, Dirtiest Death and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Somebody wrote into The CLO about a marriage that is not monogamous.  Kanye showed up unannounced to Sketchers in Manhattan Beach and was not welcome.  The Fresh Prince gave a pep talk to The Los Angeles Lakers.  A vertically challenged lady from FL called in and left Big Dog a voice message.  NFL teams that need pep talks right now are brought to you by Big Dog as Will Smith.  Carla and Shirley both got their vote on and now it's the fellas turn.  The dirtiest man alive from Iran has died.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve goes to Memory Lane and leaves us with an important lesson that he learned in college.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
